data:item.name: FRDM-STBI-A8974
data:item.display_title: Sensor shield board for FXLS8974CF ultra-low power motion wakeup sensor for IoT applications.
data:item.overview:
Sensor Boards:
  • Sensor shield board: FRDM-STBI-A8974 is a sensor add-on/companion shield board for FXLS8974CF 3-axis IoT accelerometer
Embedded Software Framework:
  • IoT Sensing SDK: Provides Embedded sensor projects for the demo and custom kits through MCUXpresso
Evaluation and Visualization Software:
  • FreeMASTER Sensor Tool: Provides out-of-box sensor demo and application development platform for FXLS8974CF
